name: Automatic Cat Feeder for Dry Food,Supplement & Treats， 6 Compartment Timed Cat Food Dispenser for Cats and Small Dogs，No Ice Needed Automatic Dog Feeder(Black)
short_description: 【Fixed Interval Feeding】The cat feeder automatic operates on a timed feeding mode, with adjustable intervals ranging from 0 to 24 hours. (For example: If the display is set to 4 hours, the lid will automatically rotate every 4 hours to dispense food.)

【Effortless Supplement & Care Feeding】 Whether it's paste-like nutritional paste mixed into kibble or crushed supplement, the cat feeder accommodates it effortlessly. Simply mix the hard to feed pet feeder with a small amount of kibble or freeze-dried food in the compartment, and your pet will ingest it alongside their regular meals. No ice packs required—a simpler, more practical solution for your pet's daytime care routine.

【Pet-Safe Material & Easy Cleaning】The cat automatic feeders feature a circular feeding tray made of BPA-free plastic, a common material in pet products. Their removable design ensures lightweight portability and effortless cleaning. They meet both your pet's feeding needs and your daily cleaning requirements. Quick cleanup takes just a few moments.

【Unique Musical Reminder】When the countdown ends and the lid rotates, the auto cat feeder emits a 30-decibel musical alert, mimicking bird chirps to wake cats for meals. This encourages pets to eat at scheduled times and in divided portions. Timing is precise, and portions are independent. Note: The sound feature may not suit all pets.

【Health Management & Fun Interaction】The dog feeder is more than just meals—it's your daytime snack and treat specialist. Six independent compartments hold irresistible treats like freeze-dried snacks, or dried fish. While you're at work, your pet enjoys scattered “snack breaks” to stave off boredom，help alleviate boredom and keep your pet engaged.

【Worry-Free Dual-Safety Design】Powered by 3 AA batteries (sold separately), the dog feeder automatic operates independently and ensures uninterrupted feeding during power outages. Combined with a precision mechanical transmission system, this dual safeguard provides reliable, long-term companionship without relying on electricity.

【Universal Size】Measuring 12×12×2.3 inches (approx. 30×30×6 cm), the timed cat feeder accommodates cats, small dogs, and pets requiring controlled feeding speeds (anti-regurgitation) or frequent small meals (e.g., puppies, kittens, or certain medical conditions).

short_description: Award-winning product: Veken is proud to be a 2023 Category Winner of the Pet Innovation Awards, an honor given to only the most forward-thinking products within the rapidly expanding Pet industry.

High-quality: Made of food-grade materials, with all water-contact parts BPA-free. Durable, easy to operate and clean. The water-level window and blue LED light attract pets and make monitoring water levels simple. A convenient switch on the cord lets you easily turn the light on or off.

Two flow designs: The Veken Pet Fountain has 2 modes: flower waterfall (faucet drinking) and the gentle fountain. The water streaming down the petals of the flower on the fountain will draw your pets attention and encourage animals to drink more often.

5 stages filtration system: In addition to keeping water fresh via circulation, the 5 stages system, including silver and coconut shell activated carbon, along with a unique composite scale inhibitor, keeps water better tasting and safer for pets.

Ultra-quiet pump: This water fountain uses an ultra-quiet, low-energy pump designed for long-term use. To maintain smooth operation, clean the pump and replace filters every 2-3 weeks. With regular care, the pump can last up to 1.5-2 years.

name: Automatic Cat Feeder with 2K Camera: 5G WiFi Automatic Dog Feeder with Night Vision,Cat Food Dispenser with 7L Large Food Storage Container for Multiple Pet,Detachable for Easy Clean -29 Cup
short_description: Go Out of Town Without Worrying : When you are traveling, attending a party or up too late to feed your pet at home, smart automatic cat feeder will regularly schedule your pet's daily food for you. No matter where you are, you can monitor your pet's daily routine and diet, as well as change your feeding schedule online, anytime, anywhere via the mobile app.

Feeding Schedule ( Regular Diet ) : Setting up a scientific feeding schedule for your pet (up to 15 meals per day, with a maximum of 20 portions per meal) with automatic dog feeder will not only improve your pet's eating habits, but also save pet owners' valuable time (you don't have to constantly think about whether your pet is getting food or not). Not only can you view your pet's feeding history in the app, but you can also view how much food is left in the dog food bowl via the camera.

Record Wonderful Moments ( Life ) : The Full HD 3 megapixel camera on the cat feeder automatic perfectly records every moment your pet is playing at home. Even when night falls, the infrared sensor in the camera provides clear night vision. It not only supports shooting and recording, but also supports storing data in TF card and cloud storage. (TF card supports up to 128GB) When you turn on motion detection, the APP will remind you when your cat is doing activities.

Dual-band WiFi : The Frienhund automatic cat feeder with camera supports dual-band WiFi (2.4GHz & 5GHz). Dual-band network lets you don't have to modify your router for channel compatibility issues. Faster 5G networks allow for more stable, crisp video quality.

Stay Close to Your Pet : “ Two-way Audio ” allows you to talk to your pet in real time. If your cat is sensitive to sound, you can adjust the volume of the feeder through the “Device Volume” in the APP. auto cat feeder supports various terminal logins, in addition to remote control via mobile phone or tablet, you can also log in to the IPC terminal via PC browser to keep your mischievous cat or dog company at all times.

Dog Food Storage Container : 7L (29 Cups) Large capacity cat food storage with desiccant continuously provides your cats or large dogs with fresh food for weeks. The 360° transparent food tank makes it easy to visualize how much food is being consumed.

No Longer Knocked Over : Are you angry about the active cats or large dogs in your house always knocking over the dog food bowl? The auto cat feeder is specially designed for this purpose with a carabiner design, you can flexibly attach automatic pet feeder to the wall so that you don't have to worry about the food bowl being knocked over by your pets anymore.

Clean More Thoroughly ( Detachable ) : The automatic cat food dispenser （BPA-Free） has a removable food tank and stainless steel bowl. Individually disassembled Food Tank can be cleaned more thoroughly. Stainless steel bowls can be placed in the dishwasher for cleaning. These removable designs make eating more hygienic for your pet.

Dual Power Supply : The cat feeder has two power supply systems. DC 5V power adapter for daily use of the dog feeder. The 3 D cell batteries ensure your pet has a continuous supply of food when your home loses power. You can enjoy your vacation or work away from home with peace of mind. ( Dual power supply recommended )

Pet Lovers : Frienhund offers a free one-year warranty and 24/7 online service for automatic feeders. The automatic cat feeder is designed for all pet lovers like me, if you have any problems, you can contact us by order, email, or phone. We will solve your problem until it is solved.

name: PetSafe Automatic Dog Feeder, 5 Meals, 40 oz Capacity, Plastic, for Dry Food, Multiple Pets
short_description: Reliable Mealtime Routine: The PetSafe 5 Meal Pet Feeder provides a consistent feeding schedule for cats and dogs with a programmable timer and automatic pet food dispenser that rotates the tray
Portion Control for Healthier Pets: This cat dog meal scheduler helps prevent overeating by dividing food into five 1-cup compartments, making it ideal for slow feeder use with dry or semi-moist food
Convenient & Easy to Maintain: Featuring a dishwasher-safe feeding tray and a battery powered feeder design, this durable indoor unit ensures stress-free cleaning and hands-free operation every day
Global Mission, Local Care: With U.S. roots and worldwide reach, PetSafe delivers vet- and trainer-recommended solutions and exceptional customer support to create fields of joy for pets
25 Years of Trust: Since 1998, PetSafe has created safe, innovative, and trusted products that bring joy, enhance pet lives, and support the lifelong bond between pets and their families
product_description: Mealtime is made simple and stress-free with the PetSafe 5 Meal Pet Feeder. Perfect for cats and small to medium-sized dogs, this programmable feeder ensures your pet never misses a meal, whether it’s breakfast, lunch, dinner, or snack time. The digital timer allows you to schedule up to five meals in advance, each served down to the minute, so your pet’s feeding routine stays consistent and reliable. One tray section is available for immediate feeding, while the remaining four rotate automatically at scheduled times. This makes it easy to stick to portion control, prevent overeating, and maintain a healthy daily diet for your pet. Each of the five compartments holds up to one cup of dry or semi-moist food, making it versatile enough for kibble, jerky bites, or freeze-dried treats. The feeder is also a great solution for pets that eat too quickly, allowing you to divide their meals into smaller servings throughout the day. The tray is fully removable and dishwasher safe for quick cleaning, giving you a hygienic and low-maintenance feeding station. Since 1988, PetSafe has been driven by a simple belief: safe, healthy pets lead to happier lives for pets and their families. For over 25 years, we've been dedicated to enhancing the lives of pets and the people who love them, treating every pet as a cherished family member and delivering life-changing innovations designed to enrich every moment. With U.S. roots and a global reach, our vet- and trainer-recommended products are built for every pet and backed by exceptional customer support. From backyards to dog parks, we're on a mission to create fields of joy for happy, healthy, and safe pets.

short_description: 【Spacious 5L Food Storage】DUDUPET cat feeder with large 5L (1.3 Gallons / 21 Cups) container holds enough dry food to last several days, saving you from daily refills. Create a consistent feeding routine that promotes healthier eating habits—perfect for weight management and multi-pet households. Spend less time cleaning and more time with your pet. The 12-hour clock is easy to program and understand.

【Dual Power Supply】DUDUPET automatic cat feeder designed with a 5V DC adapter plus 3 optional D-cell batteries (not included), this feeder works reliably even during unexpected power outages. short_description: Cat Recognition for Personalized Meals: This Petlibro automatic cat feeder identifies your cat via a lightweight RFID collar tag sensor and unlocks the food bowl lid. Adjust the lid speed to suit your cat's comfort level. (Only supports the included RFID collar tag.)

Prevent Food Stealing & Support Different Diets: The RFID-controlled locking lid ensures the right cat always gets the right meal, making it ideal for multi-cat homes with special dietary, weight management, or medication needs.

Real-Time Diet Tracking: Supported by Pawsense, the RFID cat feeder allows you to see who ate what, when and how much. Feeding logs in the Petlibro app give you a complete view of your cat's eating habits, right from your phone.

Easy to Program & Use: In-app scheduling and portion control makes it easy to maintain a regular feeding schedule, even when life gets busy. 10 meals daily, up to 48 portions each. The dual-band Wi-Fi (2.4 GHz & 5 GHz) ensures a stable connection for reliable remote access and instant alerts.

5-Layer Freshness Protection: A combination of a sealed lid with silicone gaskets, included desiccant bag, airtight rotor, and RFID-controlled food bowl lid work in unison to lock out air and moisture and keep every bit delicious. The 3 L container holds enough kibble to feed 1 cat for 2 weeks. Stainless steel bowl and other accessories are removable for easy cleaning.
